title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance
author: Grant, James
snippet: the warders; and as the earl had bestowed the intervalin cleansing himself from several spots of blood, andadjusting his todet, he passed without question thekeepers of the barrier, and several of the old hospitallers of St. Anthony, who, even at that early hour,were perambulating the Kirkgate in their long blackcassocks, which had a large T and a bell shaped in bluecloth on the breasts thereof.
